text: M×0 Genre Action, Comedy, Ecchi, Fantasy, Romance, School life, Shōnen Manga Authored by Yasuhiro Kanō Publisher Shueisha Serialized in Weekly Shonen Jump Weekly Comic, Arena Komik Boom Weekly Comic Magazine Original run May 1 2006 - Ongoing No. of volumes 4 M×0 (エム×ゼロ, Emu x Zero) is a Japanese comedy manga series by Japanese author Yasuhiro Kanō (author of Pretty Face). It is about a school that teaches students how to do magic and the crazy adventures of a normal boy who was admitted to the school under special circumstances. It was first serialized in Weekly Shonen Jump on May 1, 2006, published by Shueisha. The first volume of the series was released in Japan on November 2, 2006. Currently, four volumes have been released: *Volume 1, November 2, 2006 *Volume 2, March 2, 2007 *Volume 3, May 2, 2007 *Volume 4, July 4, 2007 ==References== Category:Manga
title: M×0
